item.title: Teaching
item.description: Student projects If you are a TU/e honors student and want to work on malware/IoT devices security/Security monitoring contact me. Courses Offensive Computer Security (2IC80) This is an introductory course on hacking, with a focus on computer networks and software. The full course will revolve around the idea that (most) mechanisms can be illegitimately misused to obtain (some level of) a desired behaviour; this is the very essence of computer security.
